Christian | Sorry For Your Loss | Sympathy Card

Top 10! Christian | Sorry For Your Loss | Sympathy Card – Sympathy Cards This item is trending! Sorry For Your Loss help you save during this period Sympathy Card You can read more about itChristian, "Sorry for Your Loss" sympathy card has a beautiful abstract watercolor design with a Scripture verse and genuine sentiment of condolence. Faith can bring much comfort during a time of loss. When words are hard to find, send an elegant card. This sympathy card lets them know that you share in their grief and you will be there for whatever need arrises. Customize the inside with your own name. The inside text can also be changed to your liking if you desire. All available through the customization tool.
